mdRecord.dcterms:description: Discussion about psychology. 'Diary entries' with date and weather, and discussion of climate change, with response. [work]
Student graffiti art and messages inscribed on carrel walls in the new stacks, Alderman Library, University of Virginia, prior to the renovation of the building, 2020-2023. [host]

you like psychology? | nah dawg | yep yep | too much reading | Feb 20, 2018 75° but "climate change isn't real" | climate = avg temps not one day smfh not saying its not real just get it straight | 9/2/18 | 3:40 90°...when will fall come?
